items.title: Hi, I'm Paul Jacobson, an Engineer from Wisconsin
items.description: About Me § Hello there! I’m a resourceful engineer with diverse mechanical and computer engineering skills. Thanks to my Engineering Physics major and Computer Science minor, I’ve delved into multiple aspects of engineering.

items.title: Resumes
items.description: Mechanical Focused Resume § Computer Sci/Software Engineering Resume § .

items.title: Portfolio
items.description: NozeWipe § 3D printer nozzle wiper for Voron printers. Scribble~Starter § Senor design project a per-writing skill tool. Sail Compass § Senor design project a per-writing skill tool.

items.title: NozeWipe
items.description: About § A Voron 3D printer mod for cleaning the nozzle of the printer. It was designed to be simple and adjustable, providing a suitable nozzle cleaner.

items.title: Sail Compass
items.description: About § This project aims to make a DIY sail compass for racing. This compass should have distance to line, timing, logging, and compass features. Motivation § Why would someone not interested in sailing make a racing compass? It is because of two reasons.

items.title: Scribble~Starter
items.description: About § The Scribble~Starter is a pen that lights up and plays sound when writing or drawing on a planner surface. The motivation is to make a tool for promoting writing skills in young kids with or without developmental delays.
